ISSUE.TITLE: [feature]: ARM64 docker images
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Summary There are no ARM 64 images of plane. Self hosting steps fail if run on ARM machines like a Raspberry pi 4B. ### Why should this be worked on? Docker compose fails on ARM machines. Extend support to a broader audience?
